data.text: N ma diina, xa i n ma falane suxu,
xa i fe kolonna xaranne ramɛ,
xa i xaxilimayaan fen,
xa i a fen alo gbetina,
nayi, i Alatala yɛɛragaxun famuma nɛn
Amasɔtɔ Alatala nan fekolonna fima,
A muxu faɲine malima,
Naxanye sigan tima tinxinni,
Xa i n xuiin namɛ,
Amasɔtɔ fe kolonna luma nɛn i yi,
I na feene yɛ fen,
E yi i xunba kɛwali ɲaxin kiraan ma,
naxanye kira tinxinxin beɲinma
naxanye sɛwan fe ɲaxin ligadeni,
naxanye sigati ki mi tinxin,
I xunbama ɲaxalan yalunxin yii na kii nin.
ɲaxanla naxan bata a mɛ a xɛmɛn na
A kɛwanle findima bɔnɔn nan na a ma,
Naxan na siga a konni,
I sigama muxu faɲine kiraan xɔn na kii nin,
Amasɔtɔ muxu faɲine siimayaan sɔtɔma nɛn yamanani.
Koni muxu ɲaxine bama nɛn yamanani,
